snippet: The French interior ministry said three men had been arrested on suspicion of conspiring to attack a military base.
abstract: French officials have detained three men accused of planning a terrorist attack on an unidentified military base.
lead_paragraph: The French interior ministry said three men had been arrested on suspicion of conspiring to attack a military base.

headline.main: France Detains 3 Men in Alleged Plot to Attack Military Base
headline.print_headline: France Detains 3 Men, Alleging a Plot to Attack a Military Base
